column1: #Text=He must be dealt with immediately and severely .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's no use , Appa .
#Text=Our best hope is to go back to the village and wait .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not sure ... " Earthbender captain says : " These dangerous hands must be crushed .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Excellent form , Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You taught me well .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yeah , that 's true , but you are clearly outmatched .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Now would you please put on some clothes ?
